name: Ibiza Digital Media
tagline: WE ARE A MODERN DIGITAL MARKETING AGENCY
description:
Everyone thinks social media is easy – you open up a page and put out one “competition/post/junk” and the fans will flock in. If you are one of these people then Good Luck (you’ll need it)! If you are more realistic and realise how important your brand image is and how important that the resources and dedication you’ve spent on building your brand should be carried through to the digital world then you have come to the right place. Forget the hard sell!
We help brands shine online just as they shine in the real world, focusing on brand awareness and interaction which yes, it might not mean a sale straight away but the next time them 50,000 followers of yours want to go and buy something you sell then you will have a much higher chance of being the first port of call for them. We concentrate a lot on trends, stats and analytics – so we only offer really good results because when something doesn’t work, we won’t try it again – we will chance, monitor and analyze what we can do to make it more effective.
